swabhawika lesin daruwa laba ganima sandaha waidyawarunta nohaki bawa danunu awasthawedi siseriyan sathkamak kirima sandaha waidyawaru yuhusulu wuha.jyeshta newasika waidya niladhari piyal udara mahathage mulika upades matha wisheshagnya shalya waidya rohan jayasuriya mahatha saha nari ha prasawa wisheshagnya waidya dabliwu.sugath di.ayi.thisera yana wisheshagnyawaru mema sathkama sidu kalaha.nari ha prasawa wisheshagnya waidya dabliw sugath di.ayi thisera mahatha mema sathkama pilibanda dakwuye mewan wu adahasaki.

sama ratakama “tha්rastha wirodhi yuddhaya” yana chaura pathakaya yatathe pa්rakashitha wanne mema pa්rawanathawayayi. 1914ta pera da 1930s ganan wala di da siduwu paridden ma, loka dhanawadaye pa්ragamiwa wardhanaya wannawu aarthika pa්rathighathithawo nawa loka yuddhayak pupura yamata maga padamin pawathithi.
